49.eng-name: The Book of the Etiquette of Judges

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sulaiman bin Yasar, who narrated from Al-Fadl bin 'Abbas, who said:"A man came to the Prophet [SAW] and said: 'O Prophet of Allah, my father is an old man and cannot perform Hajj. If I put him on a mount he cannot sit firm. Can I perform Hajj on his behalf?' He said: 'Perform Hajj on behalf of your father

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى يَحْيَى بْنِ أَبِي إِسْحَاقَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Different Reports from Yahya Ibn Abi Ishaq
